trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Newport
There were no other sightings in Newport on or around May 15th 1973
Summary: A fireball came straight down and then went back up
divs: Sighting DetailsThis all happened when I was six or seven years old so the details are a little hazy. I woke up for some reason I can't remember and heard something outside. I went out onto the porch and saw a fireball coming straight down. When it was fairly low (500 ft?) it stopped and went back up.
